segments.text: I think that you look very cute today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that right ? This is a brand new outfit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What store did you get it from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went to Macy's and picked it out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love your outfit right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I think you look nice today too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I found these new shoes earlier at the store .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that those are some really nice shoes . What kind are they ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your shoes look really nice . How much did you get them for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They only cost me about forty dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to go get a pair for myself .
segments.speaker: S2
